doc.previous: The outer product is naturally extended as a completely antisymmetric multilinear operator between any number of vectors
doc.after: A multivector that is the outer product of r independent vectors is called a blade and the blade is said to be a multivector of grade r From the axioms with closure every multivector of the geometric algebra is a sum of blades
